summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5486 for the improvement of West Myrtle Street, from 36th Avenue Southwest to 39th Avenue Southwest; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues; by constructing concrete sidewalks, concrete stairways, grading or regrading, and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 70035, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
